backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining event types, user profiles, access control, and storage plus filtering logic for blink rate and vibration telemetry.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Web Bluetooth update to target the Heart Rate service and listing affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Catalog of frontend file summaries providing short explanations of each component, hook, and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring authentication flow and TanStack Router routes for main pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing page with login prompt, hero section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Recharts line chart component visualizing blink rate history with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/charts/Vibration: Displays hourly grouped vibration events in a bar chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: Provides an input form to select and validate a device ID with a link to manage devices.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: Shows code examples for API usage with tabs and clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the top navigation bar with user profile info and route-aware navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, routed content, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: Displays AI-generated sleep schedule recommendations or prompts to generate them based on available data.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: Provides UI for selecting a time range and includes helpers to compute timestamp ranges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with identity-aware initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor, handling loading and availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Stores and validates a persisted device ID using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: React hook managing Web Bluetooth connections to a heart-rate-like service and emitting parsed blink-rate readings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for blink rates, vibration events, sleep recommendations, and user profile mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing blink rate and vibration charts, time range selection, and sleep recommendation generation.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: Page for managing saved devices, connecting via Bluetooth, receiving blink-rate readings, and storing them via backend.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Documentation page describing required telemetry fields and ESP32-C3 data ingestion behavior using UI cards and alerts.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Web Bluetooth APIs including devices, GATT servers, services, and characteristics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata containing the app summary, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for development tracking.
